bibl.title: The Egyptian Clergy and the Cult of the Ptolemaic Dynasty.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Definition of the dynastic cult. - 2. The source material. - 3. The involvement of the Egyptian clergy in the dynastic cult. - 4. Conclusion.
